Articles.Content:
Thanks for reading this, you\'re not like the half million others who didn\'t click on it. So, this is my first creation. The SR-106, named after the BlackBird. After 5 hours of kerbal deaths, engine exploding, here is my finished product. I\'m a horrible flyer, so i couldn\'t get orbit, but it\'s fully cabable to anyone who can fly better than a blind granny. I used the Nova Punch pack, and i believe that is all. I have more addons installed, but i don\'t believe any else were used. So, here\'s some screens. Leave feedback ! *NOTE* This thing has the power to get to the moon. Jus\' sayin\'.

DOWNLOAD

http://www./?2kfv61zkz2u6y6c
Anyone know what the best rocket is to use for a long=term propellant?
Very nice. I was able to get it into orbit. But had about 25% fuel left. Capable of going to the mun. In-capable of coming back to kerbin.
Thanks! I\'m working on a new prototype now, the SR-107 with better engines, an *ACTUAL* launcher, more fuel, and over all lighter.
Anyone know where to get the novapunch pack? Tried the ksp.net mod site but the download link leads to a file not on this server error

For mods you want to be in the 'Addon Releases and Project Showcase' and 'Plugin-Powered Addon Releases' section

Here is novapunch
